entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 67,535Chapters: 18/20Kudos: 273

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: On the Other Side of Hate
entry.summary:
Author: she_mammoth

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,583Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: Kyle spent his teenage years in love with Derek, the straight best friend he could never have. He spent his twenties chasing men who could never measure up. Then he met Stiles, the first person who felt real. He finally had it all. A stable relationship. His dream career. His best friend is still in his life after all these years. Until one look between Stiles and Derek shatters everything.

entry.title: Will the Truth Prevail
entry.summary:
Author: Angelic_Magician3

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,369Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Jack brings back everyone who didn't need to die after the final fight with Chuck, but without knowing the whole truth, this sparks an abundance of problems. People like Bobby, Charlie, and Castiel are brought back, but so are people like Mary and John. Ultimately, Dean is portrayed as the villain, and he loses everyone he has ever loved or even hated. Not only did close family refuse to talk or let him explain, but so did people he hadn't talked to in years. He lost everything but found something with his surrogate daughter, Mary, who needed him just as much as he needed her.The last thing he expects after a year of radio is everyone he thought he lost at the bunker's doors asking for his help.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,542Chapters: 8/15Kudos: 116

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: A Spark of Power
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,230Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: A witch wants permission to live in Beacon Hills, and decides the best way to do that would be to help out the Hale Pack and McCall Pack. To kill two birds with one stone, she decides to do a favor for the human they have joint custody of.Stiles has a Spark that has never amounted to much. He can make mountain ash work, but that's it. A witch approaches him at the diner and offers to help him with a ritual to power up his Spark and make a proper magic user out of him. After checking out her references, he decides to hear her out and brings Derek along as back up, just in case.Before the ritual can begin at the Nemeton, something happens to Derek and he loses control of his shift. The only thing that seems to help is getting fucked by Stiles. Problem? They aren't together, and Stiles hasn't told Derek about his feelings for him.

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,112Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: To Survive a Serial Killer
entry.summary:
Author: DarkScarlette

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,804Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 41

Summary: Stiles never planned to stay in Beacon Hills, but something about Derek’s empty loft made it impossible to leave. Now working as a consultant for the Sheriff’s department, he’s drawn into a chilling case. The investigation takes a personal turn when Derek suddenly returns, bloody and broken, with wounds that match the killer’s victims.With Derek back, and no clear idea what they’re up against, the pack is forced to regroup. As Stiles, Scott, Lydia, and the others race to unravel the mystery, old emotions resurface, secrets unravel, and survival becomes anything but guaranteed.Whatever this killer is, it’s not human—and it’s just getting started.

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 118,012Chapters: 21/29Kudos: 246

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,428Chapters: 8/9Kudos: 230

Cue Stiles in an exam room, shirt off, face burning, while Derek Hale—yes, that Derek Hale, his long-forgotten high school crush turned absurdly hot doctor—takes his medical history like it’s no big deal. entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,504Chapters: 29/35Kudos: 119

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,118Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 58

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,371Chapters: 12/16Kudos: 48

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: Ghostest with the Mostest
entry.summary:
Author: all_the_words

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,702Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: This is just something that has been in my files for a long time, and I don't think that I'll ever finish it. So this is truly just a half fleshed out outline for a story that could have been. I mean, I could try to finish it if people like it. I just would need that motivation. The summary I came up with is as follows:Stiles thinks he's been able to see ghost since the nogitsune. It started when he noticed two ladies following Derek around, the problem is-- no one else sees them? Stiles decides not to say anything because he's already been the Beacon Hills freak of the week, he just wants to return to normal. So he tries, that is until the ladies notice that Stiles can see them. They begin to ask Stiles for minor favors, all for Derek-- and if Stiles wasn't in love before, he definitely is now. The ladies are ecstatic as they believe Derek may be in love with him too. Stiles isn't so sure. All the while, Derek and Stiles both try to deal with their grief. Only Stiles can help Derek with his, but it seems only Allison can help Stiles with his.
